OrgName: Blackboard Inc. and its wholly owned subsidiaries
activities: Blackboard Inc. and its wholly-owned subsidiaries collect information from users of its websites and certain products or services.  This data varies according to the product or service involved, but often includes: offering product support; providing various services; enabling sales and other transactions; conducting user conferences; conducting data analysis to improve products and services; and/or maintaining marketing relationships.
corpofftitle1: Sr. Vice President & General Counsel, Secretary of Blackboard Inc.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: Blackboard participates in the Council of Better Business Bureaus, Inc. EU Safe Harbor program.
recoursemech: Blackboard participates in the Council of Better Business Bureaus, Inc. Safe Harbor Privacy Dispute Resolution program.
